full_summary:
## Network Tester Kits for CANFLTLANT Ships

### Solicitation Information

#### Solicitation Title
*English: W0100-244991 Network Tester Kits for CANFLTLANT Ships
*French: W0100-244991 - Trousses de test de réseau pour les navires de la FLTCANPA

#### Solicitation Reference Number
WS4320104933-Doc4353952091

#### Solicitation Type
Request for Proposal

#### Tender Status
Expired

### Procurement Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 28, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Halifax

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities**: Department of National Defence (DND)

### Goods and Services
The Department of National Defence requires procurement of (16) NetAlly LinkRunner AT 2000 Network Connectivity Tester Kits (or equivalent) for CANFLTLANT ships.

### Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the selection criterion.

### Additional Information
This solicitation is open to all qualified Canadian suppliers. The contracting entity will not be bound by the content of the Notice.

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Dale Wadden (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [dale.wadden@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:dale.wadden@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (Not provided)
* **Fax**: (Not provided)
* **Notice URL**: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18281471?extsite=MTgyODE0NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Unspsc Codes
* 43222643: Cable network tester
* 43223107: WLAN mobile core network equipment and components
